meta.title: Real-world WebGL 2.0 performance survey in the browser
meta.description: This test measures WebGL 2.0 performance via the stable number of draw calls, meshes, and vertices at 60 FPS. Results are collected to help optimize 3D apps on the web.

mobile.title: Mobile device detected
mobile.body1: This WebGL performance test is not intended for mobile users.
mobile.body2: Please use a desktop or laptop for accurate results and a better experience.

welcome.title: üß™ Welcome to the WebGL performance test
welcome.intro: The app will render many 3D objects to evaluate browser performance. During the test we will collect:
welcome.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please avoid opening extra tabs, heavy apps, or screen recorders during the test to ensure accurate results.
welcome.privacy: Data is collected only for research and to improve the 3D experience on the web.

decline.title: Thanks for visiting.
decline.description: You declined to participate in the test.

restart.title: Interruption detected!
restart.body: You may have switched tabs or encountered a sudden FPS drop. Please try again to ensure accurate results.

results.title: WebGL performance test results
results.thanksTail: for taking part in this test. Your contribution helps us optimize 3D performance in the browser for a better user experience!
